html:
sitteth upon the circle of the earth. This statement emphasizes the magnitude of the Lord (40:12-15), whose greatness is such that the earth is as a footstool to him (66:1).

inhabitants…as grasshoppers. The people of the earth are great in number and have devastated the land, yet compared to God, they are small and insignificant.

stretcheth out the heavens as a curtain/tent. The Lord created the heavens as easily as we open or close the curtains in our home.
